short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows how much time you're slacking off

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gain insight in the amount of time you're not being productive!

This little extension tracks how much time you spend on websites you've marked as 'slack domain'.

Click the :-) icon to change settings or view the daily report.
